meanings.definition: The work or trade of a plumber.
meanings.sent1: My uncle's plumbery skills helped fix our leaky sink.
meanings.sent2: The plumbery in our house is top-notch, thanks to the skilled workers.
meanings.sent3: The clown's attempt at plumbery ended with water spraying everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in plumbery was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The art of plumbery requires patience and attention to detail.

meanings.sent1: The store sells a variety of plumbery for home improvement projects.
meanings.sent2: The old house needed new plumbery to update the bathroom.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat was filled with colorful plumbery instead of rabbits.
meanings.sent4: The garden was decorated with whimsical plumbery, creating a unique atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The shiny plumbery gleamed under the bright lights of the showroom.

meanings.definition: The system of pipes and fixtures in a building.
meanings.sent1: The plumbery in the apartment complex needed regular maintenance.
meanings.sent2: The historic mansion had intricate plumbery that showcased the craftsmanship of the era.
meanings.sent3: The musical instrument was made out of recycled plumbery parts.
meanings.sent4: The city's underground plumbery network kept everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The plumbery of the skyscraper was a marvel of modern engineering.
